name: Overdosed VR
description:
A Colmbian police simulator within an action-packed immersive virtual reality game, respond to priority one life-threatening calls, and do your best to protect and serve the community but at the same time know your limits, and try to stay alive partner. With a large range of callouts/missions you're able to attend, ranging from "drug sales" to armed robberies and hostage situations. In this immersive simulator, you will be tested to your limits on how fast you react to bullets flying past you and how fast you can think on the spot whilst taking split-second decisions that could mean life or death.

OUR MAP
Within Overdosed VR we present you with an open world map sized, 4kmsq by 4Kmsq. Our environment is a constantly moving persistent world making for a never-ending list of jobs/tasks when you’re on duty. Choose your style of gameplay and respond to the armed robbery calls and get involved in a thrilling gunfight in the middle of the slums or patrol around in your vehicle conducting passive traffic stops searching for drugs or possible trafficking of weapons. Overdosed VR gives you the option to take an stealth or loud approach to all aspects of the game if you wanna go in like the SWAT team by all means please do, or if you wish to play detective and stake out your suspects and catch them off guard, then there is nothing stopping you.

TACTICAL GAMEPLAY
Overdosed VR brings a very grounded and immersive weapon system, Close quarter combat experience to the game that focuses on immersion and tactile gameplay. The criminals utilizing weapons and their smart AI to make your job just a little harder. The game mode will have a difficulty level of "Regular" or "Hardcore". The difficulty level will determine the reaction time and predictability of the enemies. You will be able to arrest the enemies if in the right scenarios. You will also need to collect evidence, such as dropped guns from the enemy, and conduct searches of them for any possible narcotics.
